mapper.insert: insert into invite (a_id, invited_id, invite_time, status) values (#{aId}, #{invitedId}, #{inviteTime}, #{status})

insert into account (username, email, password, role, created_at, vip, is_allow_login, is_banned) values (#{username}, #{email}, #{password}, #{role}, #{createdAt}, #{vip}, #{isAllowLogin}, #{isBanned})
